original_title: The Boy Who Wanted To Be A Lion
overview: MAX IS A SEVEN-YEAR-OLD DEAF BOY GROWING UP IN THE 1960S. ONE DAY HE GOES ON A SCHOOL TRIP TO THE ZOO, WHERE HE SEES A LION FOR THE FIRST TIME. A FEELING BEGINS TO GROW INSIDE HIM THAT WILL CHANGE HIS LIFE FOREVER.
title: The Boy Who Wanted To Be A Lion
